name: AR Pong (itch)
description:
AR Pong

A little android application that allows you to play an Augmented Reality version of Pong.

This scholar project was made by a team of 5 developpers (Alan Steunou, Cédrick, Pierre Antoine, Rowan and me) within 2 days and got minor improvements later made by mysefl.

How to play

1) Move your camera around to detect horizontal planes (i.e. a table), a texture will appear on detected planes

2) Aim at an horizontal plane to get a preview of the Pong game 

3) Pinch to resize the  Pong game

4) Click on the place button to place the Pong Game 

5) Play ! 
Aim the camera left or right to move the paddle.
